title: 01/07/21 - HOUR 2 - NFL Head Coaches & Paying Running Backs
itunes:title: 01/07/21 - HOUR 2 - NFL Head Coaches & Paying Running Backs
description:
Hour 2, Dan and the crew discuss the importance of being ready for NFL head coaching job interviews. Example being Pittsburgh Steelers Head Coach Mike Tomlin, not being an initial candidate but a impressive interview won him the job. Also how some owners may turn good coaches off from wanting to be apart of the organization, while also speaking on how paying running backs big money up front is a bad investment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
